sense.def:
Kadar se nekaj zgodi
once
, se zgodi samo takrat in nikoli več oziroma nikoli več v določenem obdobju.

seg.quote: I've been out with him once, that's all.
Some trees only bear fruit once every twenty-five years.

sense.def:
Kadar je nekaj bilo res
once
, je bilo res v preteklosti, zdaj pa ni več.

seg.quote: Texas was once ruled by Mexico.

sense.def:
Kadar se nekaj zgodi
once another thing has happened
, se zgodi takoj potem, ko se je zgodilo nekaj drugega.

seg.quote: Once inside her flat, she glanced at the clock.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj naredimo
at once
, tisto naredimo takoj.

seg.quote: I knew at once that something was wrong.

sense.def:
Kadar se več stvari zgodi
at once
ali
all at once
, se vse zgodijo ob istem času.

Kadar se nekaj zgodi
once again
ali
once more
, se zgodi znova.

seg.quote: She wanted to see him once more before she died.
Companies are once again queueing to join the scheme.

sense.def:
Če je človek nekaj naredil
once or twice
, je tisto naredil nekajkrat, ne pa zelo pogosto.

seg.quote: She had been to London once or twice before.

sense.def:
Če se nekaj zgodi
once in a while
, se zgodi občasno.

seg.quote: Once in a while she'd give me some lilacs to take home.

sense.def:
Kadar rečemo, da se je nekaj zgodilo
for once
, s tem poudarimo, da se sicer to ponavadi ne dogaja.

seg.quote: For once Castle went without his lunch.

sense.def:
Kadar se nekaj zgodi
once and for all
, se zgodi v celoti ali dokončno.

seg.quote: They had to be defeated once and for all.

sense.def:
Once upon a time
se uporablja na začetku otroških pripovedk in pomeni, da naj bi se dogodki zgodili pred davnimi časi.
